baseRule.text: 若比丘尼。讀誦種種呪術。波夜提(一百四十)。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 140

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼誦治病經方。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 144

partialParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī tiracchānavijjaṁ pariyāpuṇeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
partialParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 49

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber weltliches Wissen lernt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni study lowly arts (literally, bestial knowledge), it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang mempelajari seni rendahan (secara harfiah, pengetahuan binatang), itu harus di akui.

partialParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，誦習世俗術者，波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 117

partialParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼從俗人受學呪法者。波逸底迦。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 150

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼誦外道呪術。若教人誦。波逸提(一百九十)。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 190
